CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Golden Spoon relative to Sky High Cafe?
SRP.A: The Golden Spoon is {above} Sky High Cafe in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Golden Spoon relative to Crimson Plate?
SRP.A: The Golden Spoon is {above} Crimson Plate in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Plate relative to Sky High Cafe?
SRP.A: Crimson Plate is {above} Sky High Cafe in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {The Golden Spoon}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total customer traffic?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sky High Cafe}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Plate's maximum Customer Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Plate's maximum Customer Traffic is in {1975}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Sky High Cafe's minimum Customer Traffic in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Sky High Cafe's minimum Customer Traffic is in {1965}.

NC.Q: Was the total Customer Traffic in 1962 higher or lower than in 1965?
NC.A: The total customer traffic in 1962 was {lower} than in 1965.

NC.Q: Between 1956 and 1971, was the average total Customer Traffic higher or lower than between 1966 and 1975?
NC.A: The average total customer traffic between 1956 and 1971 was {lower} than between 1966 and 1975.

NC.Q: Between 1954 and 1964, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1958 and 1966?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between 1954 and 1964 was {larger} than between 1958 and 1966.

NC.Q: Between 1953 and 1965, did the total Customer Traffic experience a larger or smaller change than between 1966 and 1967?
NC.A: The change in total customer traffic between 1953 and 1965 was {larger} than between 1966 and 1967.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Crimson Plate} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Crimson Plate and The Golden Spoon first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Crimson Plate and The Golden Spoon first exchanged leading positions in {1952}.
